description:
The link functionality allows developers to easily test their libraries.
Linking is a two-step process.

Using 'iotor link' in a project folder will create a global link.
Then, in some other library, 'iotor link <name>' will create a link in the components folder pointing to the previously created link.

This allows to easily test a library because changes will be reflected immediately.
When the link is no longer necessary, simply remove it with 'iotor uninstall <name>'.
